akn:section.akn:heading: Providing engraved plates of portraits of deceased members of Congress

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5155. Providing engraved plates of portraits of deceased members of Congress On conditions the Secretary of the Treasury decides, the Secretary may send an engraved plate of a portrait of a deceased Senator or Representative to an heir or legal representative of such a Senator or Representative. (Pub. L. 97–258, Sept. 13, 1982, 96 Stat. 993.)
